attributes.additional_details: PLEASE PLEASE GIVE US OUR CHILDREN BACK! Social workers have too much POWER AND DISCRIMINATE, LIE, TOTALLY RIPPING OUR FAMILIES APART FOR NO REASON? attributes.background: There is to much conspiracy and making the so called rules as they SEE FIT AS THEY CLAIM TO BE PROFESSIONALS? It is totally evil and the government is DESTROYING OUR LIVES… AND IT HAS GOT TO BE STOPPED
